name: Dai Katana, 100cm
description: The hybrid Dai Katana latex sword is the preferred weapon of the Samurai. This intricate larp sword is unmatched in beauty. The subtle simplicity of this larp weapon is only surpassed by its voracity on the battle field. The grip is wrapped in a stiff nylon ending with awesome two tone tsuba. Length: 100cm

name: Crusader Sword, 100cm
description: The crusader latex hybrid long sword is a great sidearm inspired from knights of old. Its impressive durability is surpassed by the intricate detailing that would please any paladin.  The appeal of this weapon will give you confidence and safety on the field. 100cm

name: Viridian Dao, 100cm
description: With the rush of magic pulsing through your veins you know that the power with the blade of your Viridian Dao is the only thing that will stop the golem. In one flawless movement your slash the creature dealing the fatal blow. Energy drained, now you must rest.

name: Infernal Footman Sword, 100cm
description: Forged with the Lava from Mount Doom the Inferno Footman sword houses the powers from mother earth. This long sword was made to battle ancient immortals but releasing its fury on common mortals means certain death.

name: Inferno Ranger, 100cm
description: Some say the breath of the Balrog was used in the forging of this Inferno Ranger sword. If this is true then the battle has already been won, as you hold the damnation of man in your hands.

name: Jade Dao, 100cm
description: Roaming the crowded streets, you notice that the townsfolk are not used to seeing weapons of that caliber. They grin as they notice the intricate carvings on your Jade Dao longsword and you know that you have now must be vigilant.

name: Celtic Leaf Sword, 100cm
description: There is nothing that could make you prouder. Receiving this sword from your King has earned you the respect of the village. You have been given this Celtic Leaf Sword knowing full well that the life of others hangs in the balance and only you can save them.

name: Aether Dao, 100cm
description: The Gods must be shining on you today. You know that the electricity that is flowing through your veins is also powering your Aether Dao Sword. You can see the fear in your enemyâ€™s eyes as you lead the charge alone against many.

name: Ranger Sword, 105cm
description: Wherever you may roam or travel, your Ranger Long Sword will always be by your side. This hybrid latex long sword had an intricate curved polyurethane crossguard and has a leather like grip, ideal for any ranger or scout. 105cm

name: Spatha Sword, 105cm
description: As the horns blow and the legion marches on you are now given the rank of soldier and are entrusted with your Spartha Longsword. It is a fine larp sword with a polyurethane handle and a durable latex blade that will company you through many battles. 105cm

name: Jian Sword, 105cm
description: This impressive Jian foam long sword is the perfect weapon for any oriental fighter. It is a sleek and reliable larp sword, rich in detail and made to last. The polyurethane foam hilt is rich in color with ornate hand painted details. Length: 105cm

name: Dwarf Double Edge Sword, 105cm
description: This amazing long sword was forged in the fires of the Dwaven King. This hybrid larp sword has a unique foam blade coated dipped in latex. The beautifully detailed hilt is made from a durable polyurethane foam symbolic of the perfection of the Dwarven blacksmiths. Length: 105cm

name: Dwarf Single Edge Sword, 110cm
description: This Dwarven Long Sword will cleave through anything. This larp sword possesses a unique cleaver like latex blade and has a beautiful ornate polyurethane foam hilt and handle. Make this foam long sword part of your arsenal and feel the strength of a dwarven forged weapon. Length: 105cm

name: Viking Sword, 100cm
description: You will fight many epic battles with this Viking long sword. This larp sword has a beautifully carved polyurethane foam hilt with a real leather grip. This long blade is made from foam and coated in thick latex and is safe for Live Action Role Playing. Length: 100cm

name: Saber Sword, 100cm
description: The hybrid Saber Long Sword is the preferred weapon of any soldier. This stunning larp weapon has a beautiful curved foam blade coated in latex. The intricate steampunk style hilt is made from durable polyurethane foam and was hand painted to perfection. Length: 100cm

name: Elven Sword, 105cm
description: This sleek elven long sword is the embodiment of talent and craftsmanship of the elven blade smiths. This safe foam larp sword is coated in a thick latex and has a hand painted polyurethane foam handle and gilded to perfection. Any wood elf warrior can appreciate the talent it took to perfect such a fine larp weapon. Length: 105cm

name: Squire Long, 100cm
description: The squire foam long sword is a simple soldiers weapon essential for any historic larp battle. This larp sword has a soft foam blade coated in a durable latex with a fiberglass core. The polyurethane foam handle has been hand painted and has a simulated wooded grip. Length: 100cm

name: Rapier Sword, 100cm
description: The Hybrid Rapier Long Sword have a very long thin latex blade typical for any fencing sword. The cross guard is cast from a durable polyurethane foam which allows a great attention to detail. This larp long sword will make you feel confident in its safety and durability on the battlefield. Length:100cm

name: Noble Sword ,105cm
description: This instrument of death is the perfect dueling sword. Our Noble Longsword features a detailed polyurethane crossguard with simulated wood grip and has a long central ridged latex blade. A fortunate find for any noble. 105cm

name: Small Sword, 100cm
description: Our Hybrid Small Sword has a latex double-edged blade with a detailed polyurethane foam basket hilt. The intricate crossguard wraps around the hand, protecting your hand and the authentic leather wrapped grip. 100cm

name: Footman Sword ,110cm
description: If you want your dirty work to get done you had better do it yourself. Our Footman Long Sword has an authentic medieval look common for any soldier. The polyurethane foam grip and crossguard is accentuated long straight blade. 110cm
